Builders, spies, and support units can always be purchased using [ICON_Faith]Faith[NEWLINE]Modifiers will change with technology and municipal Development increases [ICON_Strength] combat power, but [COLOR:ResMilitaryLabelCS][ICON_Gold] maintenance fees will also increase[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Non-elite modifiers cannot provide [ICON_Strength] combat power and [ICON_Ranged] ranged combat power to the city.

The characteristic area of ​​the Holy Tree Domain, replacing {LOC_DISTRICT_PRESERVE_NAME}, is initially unlocked, has a lower cost and will not increase in price, and can be built regardless of population demand. After completion, the surrounding cells will receive +2[ICON_Food]Food +2[ICON_Production]Productivity +2[ICON_Gold]Gold Coins[NEWLINE]{LOC_BUILDING_GROVE_NAME}After completion, the surrounding cells will +2[ICON_Production]Production +2[ICON_Faith]Faith +2[ICON_Science]Scientific Research[NEWLINE]After {LOC_BUILDING_SANCTUARY_NAME} is built, the surrounding cells +2[ICON_Food]Food +2[ICON_Production]Productivity +2[ICON_Science]Scientific Research[NEWLINE]The improved cells will also enjoy the above effects.

The characteristic area of ​​the Holy Tree Domain, which replaces the theater square, is initially unlocked, is free to build and will not increase in price, and can be built regardless of population demand. Has unique [ICON_Culture] culture and [ICON_Faith] adjacent bonuses
+{1_num} [ICON_Culture] Culture comes from adjacent man-made wonders
A unique unit of the industrial era. It is very good at fighting cavalry. It has several special abilities and is very weak against armored targets.
A powerful special unit in the information age, good at dealing with all armored targets
A powerful special unit in the information age, good at dealing with various urban defenses and able to fight on waters.
A powerful characteristic unit in the information age, good at killing enemies from long distances
A powerful special unit in the atomic age, good at resisting pressure on the front line
Special unit, very good at fighting cavalry[NEWLINE][COLOR:ResMilitaryLabelCS] Researching heavy cavalry technology can improve the unit's combat effectiveness[ENDCOLOR]

Modern characteristic unit, good at dealing with armored targets, but still somewhat weak against composite armor [NEWLINE][COLOR:ResMilitaryLabelCS] Researching light cavalry technology can improve the unit's combat effectiveness[ENDCOLOR]

Special unit, good at dealing with various urban defenses, able to fight on water[NEWLINE][COLOR:ResMilitaryLabelCS] Researching light cavalry and heavy cavalry technology can improve the unit's combat effectiveness[ENDCOLOR]
Special unit, good at killing enemies from long distances[NEWLINE][COLOR:ResMilitaryLabelCS] Researching melee technology can improve the unit's combat effectiveness[ENDCOLOR]
Special unit, good at frontline resistance [NEWLINE][COLOR:ResMilitaryLabelCS] Researching melee technology can improve the unit's combat effectiveness[ENDCOLOR]

A powerful special unit in the information age. Only some Modifier leaders can train it. Its combat effectiveness is much higher than that of melee Modifiers. It can ignore area control and cause full damage to city defenses.
A powerful unique unit of the Atomic Age. Only some Modifier Leaders can train it. It has a [ICON_Ranged] bombing attack with a range of 1 and can fight on water.

A powerful unique unit in the information age. Only some Modifier leaders can train it. It has greater mobility than heavy weapon Modifiers, but its melee combat effectiveness is extremely low. Please deploy this Modifier with caution.

Special unit, only some modifier leaders can train, its combat effectiveness is much higher than that of melee modifiers, it can ignore area control, and cause full damage to city defenses [NEWLINE][COLOR:ResMilitaryLabelCS] Research light cavalry and heavy cavalry technology Can increase unit combat effectiveness[ENDCOLOR]

Special unit, only some Modifier Leaders can train, has [ICON_Ranged] bombing attack with a range of 1, and can fight on water[NEWLINE][COLOR:ResMilitaryLabelCS] Researching melee technology can improve the unit's combat effectiveness[ENDCOLOR]

Special unit, only some modifier leaders can train. It has stronger mobility than heavy weapon modifiers, but its melee combat effectiveness is extremely low[NEWLINE][COLOR:ResMilitaryLabelCS] Researching melee technology can improve the unit's combat effectiveness[ENDCOLOR]

A special support unit, it has its own combat power, and all formation units gain the movement power of this unit. [COLOR:ResMilitaryLabelCS]The maintenance cost of this unit is extremely high, please build with caution! [ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][COLOR:ResMilitaryLabelCS] Researching light cavalry and heavy cavalry technology can improve the combat effectiveness of units[ENDCOLOR]
A girl who doesn't like to communicate with others, always quietly looking at the night sky alone, seems to have had a dark childhood experience.

Lively and carefree, the former Onibo is the biggest troublemaker in the Eye of Deep Space. She spent all her excess energy on pranks, and claimed to have an air friend named "Hougui", but no one knew whether the existence of Hougui was true or not.

The most popular corrector in the headquarters is affectionately called "Little Osiris" by everyone. After discovering the troubles of his companions, he will try his best to quietly offer help and always put his companions' affairs first.

Leviathan, who is full of energy every day, is a cute little boy who occasionally gets confused. Although he has an innocent and lively personality, he is surprisingly jealous. Please don't be too close to Vidal in front of her.
The Modifier was brought back from a frozen primeval area. Her long-term solitary life made her seem a little cold and lonely, and she seemed not to be very good at interpersonal communication.

Skadi is one of the very few field correctors of Department 9 who directly accepts Xio's command, and is specifically responsible for investigating signs of visible wreckage activities in the ocean area. Although she looks carefree on the surface, at critical moments, she always shows the courage that a captain should have.

A girl who joined the Eye of Deep Space on the condition of "carrying out free research and invention" is currently working in the Cryptozoology Team. However, even though he was employed, he hardly participated in the battle against the corpse. He seemed to be only interested in inventions and tarot cards.

One of the main leaders of the Hidden Science Team, he developed most of the AI ​​systems in the Eye of Deep Space, including the "Mimir System". With the goal of completely eliminating visual skeletons, we pursue precision and efficiency in everything we do.

Hodel, a member of the Intelligence Section, and his sister Badr are twins. Unlike his sister's cheerful and generous character, Hodel just silently follows his sister's light and does not reveal himself too much.
He has exactly the same appearance as Osiris, but his inner dominant personality is the crazy "Pluto". He has great power and disdains cooperation with other modifiers.

The captain of Deep Space Eye's "Thunder Squad" and the strongest combatant in the organization. In the various actions of the team, even if there are constant mistakes, they can always be completed by relying on her strength in the end. Thor has a great sense of justice, but corresponding to his wild fighting style, he is often impulsive in dealing with things.

The unit has +7 [ICON_Strength] combat power, +4 [ICON_Movement] movement power, and all formation units gain the [ICON_Movement] movement power of the accompanying unit.

Special improved facilities, only some Modifier leaders can build them, +2 [ICON_Production] productivity, +1 charm for surrounding cells, improved facilities can obtain an additional 100% [ICON_Gold] gold coin output based on the cell charm value, research After {LOC_TECH_INDUSTRIALIZATION_NAME}, the improvement facility can gain 25% [ICON_Tourism] tourism performance based on the gold coin output, and can only be built on cells with forests or rainforests.

Tianyuan Divine Realm's characteristic area, an alternative to the commercial center, is initially unlocked, has a lower cost and will not increase in price, and can be built regardless of population demand. It has a unique [ICON_Gold] gold coin adjacent bonus. After completion, you will get 2 [ICON_TradeRoute] trade routes and 2 merchants. The city created by you, Tianlu Trade [ICON_Gold] gold coin adjacent bonus also provides [ICON_Science] technology value

The characteristic area of ​​Tianyuan God's Domain is an alternative to the holy land. It is initially unlocked, is free to build and will not increase in price. It can be built regardless of population demand. Featuring the unique [ICON_Food] food adjacent bonus, the [ICON_Food] food adjacent bonus also provides [ICON_Faith] faith. For cities created by you, the Quadrangle [ICON_Food] food adjacency bonus also provides [ICON_Culture] culture value

Born in Xuheng, he followed his teacher Xihe to practice Tiantong Technique at Ruomu Palace on Nanjiao Island since he was a child. He is righteous and upright, but for some reason he has some secondary problems. Following the teacher's instructions, I am currently practicing my journey down the mountain.

The agent of Nandao of Sifangyuan is a doctor and is well aware of the sufferings of the people. She established the medical clinic "Chi Qi Tang" in Nanjiao and opened many branches to spread the knowledge of solutions to disease symptoms. Lingguang often personally visited the hospital to treat patients who came to seek medical treatment, and listened to their trivial life stories.

The characteristic area of ​​the Nile God's Domain, replacing the Holy Land, initially unlocked, has a lower cost and will not increase in price, can be built regardless of population demand, +3 [ICON_Housing] housing, without any adjacent bonus and has ten expert slots. After completion, the +2 [ICON_Faith] faith for each [ICON_Citizen] citizen in the city

The characteristic area of ​​the Nile God's Domain, an alternative to the industrial area, is initially unlocked, is free to build and will not increase in price, can be built regardless of population demand, +3 [ICON_Housing] housing, does not have any adjacent bonuses and has ten expert slots. After completion, the +2 [ICON_Production] productivity per [ICON_Citizen] citizen in the city

You can obtain more after researching related technologies. High output, allowing construction on floodplains, oases, and swamps without resources

The operations specialist of Korgai's Major Crime Countermeasures Division is code-named "Cat", but he is still in the internship stage and is affectionately called "Kitten" by his colleagues in the team. Currently performing various tasks with Anubis, calling him "Senior".
The white-haired stalker who looks a bit cynical and likes to tease younger people, the most likely place to find her is at the bustling festivals.
The Prophecy of the Raging Waves

Modifiers with the ability to enter dreams and invite others into dreams. But because she cannot control this ability well, she is now adopted by Hades in the Muse Society, and is taken care of by Hades' two puppet maids.

The actual head of the Muse Association, responsible for coordinating and managing the various business activities of the Muse Association as a corrector. He is revered in the parliament because of his terrifying character and appearance that has not changed in thirty years, and is known as the "ageless one". Witch".

Although it is difficult for outsiders to believe it, Luliang is indeed the current president of Tianlu Trading. It is precisely because of her outstanding business skills that Tianlu Trading has achieved its current status. In addition, she is also one of the leaders of the Xuheng District Modifier Organization.

The personnel director of Tianlu Trading has a dull appearance but a sharp mind, and he values ​​efficiency in everything he does. Before awakening, he and his sister Lin Yu were dependent on each other and experienced many hardships. Privately, he likes to travel around alone and has accumulated a lot of side knowledge of unknown uses.
